original_text: Yes, when God judges everyone, he will punish the people from Tyre and Sidon. But he will punish much more you people from Chorazin and Bethsaida.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 이르노니 심판 날에 두로와 시돈이 너희보다 견디기 쉬우리라

sentences.korean_translation: 네, 하나님이 모든 사람을 심판하실 때

sentences.original_text: he will punish the people from Tyre and Sidon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두로와 시돈 사람들을 벌하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But he will punish much more
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 훨씬 더 많이 벌하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you people from Chorazin and Bethsaida
